verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H569>Amraphel<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%>, <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar<s%>, <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, and <S%H8413>Tidal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>Goiim<s%>,

that they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H1298>Bera<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and with <S%H1306>Birsha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, <S%H8134>Shinab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah<s%>, and <S%H8038>Shemeber<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> (the same <S%H1931>is<s%> <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>).
All these joined <S%H2266>together<s%> in the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%> (the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>).
Twelve <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%>, and in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> they <S%H4775>rebelled<s%>.

And in the <S%H6240>fourteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%>, and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that were with <S%H5221>him<s%>, and smote the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> in <S%H6255>Ashteroth-karnaim<s%>, and the <S%H2104>Zuzim<s%> in <S%H1990>Ham<s%>, and the <S%H368>Emim<s%> in <S%H7741>Shaveh-kiriathaim<s%>,
and the <S%H2752>Horites<s%> in their <S%H2042>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, unto <S%H364>Elparan<s%>, which is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And they <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5880>En-mishpat<s%> (the same is <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>), and <S%H5221>smote<s%> all the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%>, and also the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2688>Hazazon-tamar<s%>.

And there went <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> (the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>); and they <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in array against them in the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%>;

against <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, and <S%H8413>Tidal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>Goiim<s%>, and <S%H569>Amraphel<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%>, and <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> against the <S%H2568>five<s%>.

Now the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%> was full <S%H875>of<s%> slime <S%H875>pits<s%>; and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H7604>there<s%>, and they that remained <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.
And they <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H7399>goods<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, and all their <S%H400>victuals<s%>, and went their <S%H3212>way<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%>, <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and his <S%H7399>goods<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%>.

And there <S%H935>came<s%> one that had <S%H6412>escaped<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%>: now he <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> by the <S%H436>oaks<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>, the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H6063>Aner<s%>; and these were <S%H1167>confederate<s%> with <S%H87>Abram<s%>.

And when <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that his <S%H251>brother<s%> was taken <S%H7617>captive<s%>, he led <S%H7324>forth<s%> his <S%H2593>trained<s%> <S%H3211>men<s%>, born in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6240>eighteen<s%>, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> as far as <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.

And he <S%H2505>divided<s%> himself against them by <S%H3915>night<s%>, he and his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H7291>them<s%>, and pursued them unto <S%H2327>Hobah<s%>, which is on the left <S%H8040>hand<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>.

And he brought <S%H7725>back<s%> all the <S%H7399>goods<s%>, and also brought <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%>, and his <S%H7399>goods<s%>, and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H5971>also<s%>, and the people.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H310>him<s%>, after his <S%H7725>return<s%> from the <S%H5221>slaughter<s%> of <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that were with <S%H6010>him<s%>, at the vale of <S%H7740>Shaveh<s%> (the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H4428>King<s%>'s <S%H6010>Vale<s%>).

And <S%H4442>Melchizedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8004>Salem<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%>: and he was <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High<s%>.

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H87>Abram<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High<s%>, <S%H7069>possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>:

and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be <S%H410>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High<s%>, who hath <S%H4042>delivered<s%> thine <S%H6862>enemies<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>. And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a tenth of <S%H4643>all<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me the <S%H5315>persons<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> the goods to <S%H7399>thyself<s%>.

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, I have lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H410>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High<s%>, <S%H7069>possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>,

that I will <S%H518>not<s%> take a <S%H2339>thread<s%> nor a <S%H5275>shoe-latchet<s%> nor <S%H518>aught<s%> <S%H3947>that<s%> is <S%H559>thine<s%>, lest thou shouldest say, I have <S%H6238>made<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H6238>rich<s%>:

save <S%H1107><s%> only that <S%H834>which<s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> have <S%H398>eaten<s%>, and the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H6063>me<s%>, Aner, <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>; let <S%H1992>them<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H2506>portion<s%>.
